title.narrative: Addressing Critical Gaps HIV Prevention, Treatment, Care

description.narrative: The projects seeks to address the critical gaps in HIV/AIDS interventions in Zimbabwe through reaching the most vulnerable populations in each of the 10 provinces of Zimbabwe.

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

title.narrative: Integrated Results and Resources Framework (IRRF)

description.narrative: The IRRF is UNDP’s results framework to monitor and report on its achievements against the Strategic Plan 2018-2021. UNDP publishes country level IRRF results that UNDP’s projects contributed to

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.1.3.C

description.narrative: Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: New data sources (e.g. big data)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.2.2.A.2

description.narrative: Volume of additional resources leveraged through public and private financing for the SDGs with UNDP support: Volume at national level: Private

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.2.2.A.1

description.narrative: Volume of additional resources leveraged through public and private financing for the SDGs with UNDP support: Volume at national level: Public

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.1.3.B

description.narrative: Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: Administrative reporting systems

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.1.1.3.A

description.narrative: Country has data collection/analysis mechanisms providing disaggregated data to monitor progress towards the SDGs: Conventional data collection methods (e.g. surveys)

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.3.A.1

description.narrative: Number of people who have access to HIV and related services, disaggregated by sex and type of service (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Behavior Change Communications: Total people reached

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.3.A.2

description.narrative: Number of people who have access to HIV and related services, disaggregated by sex and type of service (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Number of males reached

title.narrative: Output Indicator 1.2.1.3.A.3

description.narrative: Number of people who have access to HIV and related services, disaggregated by sex and type of service (Note: This indicator is reported on an annual basis, not cumulative. Please report expected and actual achievement for the reporting year only, excluding baseline values.) Number of females reached
